summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeGive BackILIA Lip Sketch Hydrating Crayon combines the creamy texture of lipstick with the precision of liner. Glide it on for rich color with a soft-matte finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsLong-wear, up to 12-hoursBleed-resistantSmoothingBarrier-building12 soft-matte shadesCreamy, weightless textureDermatologist-testedKey IngredientsSea Succulent - Dramatically boosts hydration + helps replenish the skin barrier over timeHyaluronic Acid - Attracts moisture to skin to hydrate, smooth + plump for fuller-looking lipsSeaweed Extract - Sustainably sourced skin supporter that visibly improves definition + volumeRosehip Oil - Skin conditioner rich in fatty acids that help to nourish + soften lipsResearch Results100% said lips were smoothed*98% said lips looked fuller*98% said their lips felt moisturized**96% said the product doesn't bleed**Instant results(*). Results after 8 days(**).Item 2629392How To UseUse ILIA Large Sharpener to get a precise point. Start at the outer corner of lips to create your desired shape. Color inside the lines for rich, all-over pigment.IngredientsTridecyl Trimellitate, Octyldodecanol, Dicalcium Phosphate, Synthetic Wax, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Diisostearyl Malate, Synthetic Beeswax, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Salicornia Herbacea Extract, Undaria Pinnatifida Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Leaf Extract, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Barium Sulfate. May Contain: CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 15850 (Red 7 Lake), Mica, CI 15850 (Red 6), CI 19140 (Yellow 5 Lake), CI 15850 (Red 7), CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), CI 15850 (Red 7), CI 45410 (Red 28 Lake), CI 42090 (Blue 1 Lake), CI 45380 (Red 22 Lake), CI 15985 (Yellow 6 Lake).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use ILIA Large Sharpener to get a precise point. Start at the outer corner of lips to create your desired shape. Color inside the lines for rich, all-over pigment.

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: Love this lip liner !  Goes on smoothly and many pretty colors.

reviews.headline: Pretty good but not perfect
reviews.comments:
First- the 12 hour claim is dubious at best. I tried using their setting powder as recommended on instagram but with minimal success. Don't expect to be able to eat or drink without some of it coming off. It's a high bar, but one that I'm looking for in a long wear lip color.  That being said I like the fact that it isn't sticky which makes it far preferable to the urban decay product I was using before. 
Second: the range of colors needs to be expanded- I find many of the light/mid toned colors to have an orange-ish base. Rhyme was the closest thing that worked on me but would prefer some cooler hues that aren't super dark. I recommend looking/trying at the store before buying- I ended up having to return one that I took a chance on.
Third: while I like the idea of liner and color together I think it doesn't function well as a liner. It may be too soft, I don't know. I'd prefer a separate pencil if it would hold better.

reviews.headline: I like
reviews.comments: I love this brand. I got it as a mini sanple ans bought the full version ðŸ¥¸

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: I received Banquette as part of a gift pack from Ulta.  The color is neutral, goes on smooth (not a dry crayon) and the matte finish lasts.

reviews.headline: Obsessed with these
reviews.comments: I have three different shades and absolutely love these. They're long lasting and have a matte finish, but are still hydrating. Highly recommend them!

reviews.headline: Love love love
reviews.comments: Absolutely love, its become my new go to lip liner

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I love this shade!! It's my perfect "your lips but better" shade and it's so easy to throw in your bag and reapply whenever.

reviews.headline: Yessssssssssssss
reviews.comments:
I saw this a few times in store and was likeâ€¦ ok? Why?
But then thought it would be a user friendly lip liner layering option with a lip stain. I purchased the color Kiln and now I get it. Love the color, very blendable, buildable and generally lovely. I'm a blurred lip kinda woman and this delivers everytime. It doesn't last long for me, definitely need to reapply after eating or drinking or just living life, but I'm ok with that. If you're not then pass, but the color and application are a winner for me.

reviews.headline: Happy with product
reviews.comments: It's been awhile since I have gotten a crayon-styled lip product and for some reason, this was calling my name, probably due to the simple yet pretty packaging. The formula itself was easy to work with. The tip of the crayon is sharp enough to line the lips while I used the side as a allover lip color. The formula is soft and isn't drying on my dry lips. It stays on like a normal lipstick so don't expect a long-lasting formula. What I love the most about this product is the color, Earthen. It's a semi-brick red color and it is lovely as a lip liner and also as a lip color. Very happy with this!

reviews.headline: Okay?
reviews.comments: Piazza is not a poppy red, it's orange. Disappointed but I will keep it. Staying power is okay.

reviews.headline: Awesome  product I will repurchase.
reviews.comments: Line lips , full cover lipstick that has staying power that doesn't dry out or flake .

reviews.headline: Impressive!
reviews.comments: I had been thinking about purchasing this lipstick for a while, but hesitated because of the price. I finally decided to give it a try and I LOVE it! It goes on so nicely and stays put for hours.

reviews.headline: Okay?
reviews.comments: I love the concept of ILIA's clean besuty, and the color of this crayon, but I can't get over the acetone like smell of this lip crayon. Every time I open it, I get a strong whiff of nail polish. It's quite off putting.

reviews.headline: God Awful.
reviews.comments: This lip crayon is honestly probably one of the worst ones ive ever used. The color bleeds terribly so if youre planning on using this as an all day color, no youre not. It will also turn completely orange on you if you have any sort of cool undertone in your skin. Dont waste your money.

reviews.headline: Can't believe the texture of this product
reviews.comments: I have never felt a lip pencil that glides on like this. I filled my lips and it still feels incredible. Beautiful shades and great pigment. Definitely coming back for more.

reviews.headline: Love This!
reviews.comments: Great saturated color and easy to apply.  Went back and bought another one.  The only downside is that you have to sharpen it when it wears down.  I prefer the ones that twist up.

reviews.headline: Wonderful Stay Power
reviews.comments: Great product yet very expensive for a pencil.

reviews.headline: It's Ok
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this stuff, but on me, the color looked like mauve!   It was supposed to be like a Rosie Brown. It did go smoothly and lasted a bit.

reviews.headline: Caused cold sores
reviews.comments: Every tine i use this i get a cold sore. I dont see that it has almond oil in it, (which can cause flare ups), so i dont know which ingredient is causing it.

reviews.headline: Love these pencils
reviews.comments:
Glides on nicely, pigmented and rich in color; colors are accurate to photos
Not sure how well they sharpen but the pencil seems sturdy

faceoff_positive.comments: Lip Sketch Hydrating Lipstick + Lip Liner Crayon is a game-changer for anyone seeking both color and hydration in their lip products. The innovative dual-ended design houses a creamy lipstick on one end and a matching lip liner crayon on the other, simplifying your makeup routine and ensuring a flawless finish.  Firstly, let's talk about hydration. The formula is infused with nourishing ingredients like shea butter and vitamin E, leaving your lips feeling moisturized and smooth throughout the day. Unlike some lipsticks that can leave lips feeling dry and chapped, Lip Sketch keeps them supple and comfortable.  The pigmentation is another standout feature. Whether you prefer a subtle hint of color or a bold statement lip, this product delivers. The lipstick glides on effortlessly, providing rich, even coverage, while the lip liner allows for precise application and definition.  I also appreciate the versatility of this product. The lipstick and lip liner shades are carefully curated to complement each other, making it easy to create cohesive looks. Plus, the compact size makes it perfect for on-the-go touch-ups.  Overall, Lip Sketch Hydrating Lipstick + Lip Liner Crayon earns top marks for its hydrating formula, vibrant pigmentation, and convenient design. Whether you're a makeup novice or a beauty aficionado, this product is sure to become a staple in your collection.
faceoff_positive.headline: hydrating formula

faceoff_negative.comments: My sister sent me an Ilia product that I liked a lot so I recently ordered the Lip Sketch Hydrating Crayon they've been pumping on Instagram. I ordered a pencil in Case Study, a true red and was excited when my package arrived today. Not only didn't I get the product I ordered, but they sent me two pencils in totally unrelated colors and a sharpener I didn't order. I was also missing the one sample I requested and really cared about as I was interested in ordering a full size of that product. I'm disappointed in the quality control on the fulfillment end. It is like they just grabbed stuff and shoved it into a box. Now I have to deal with returns and another wait for the product I actually wanted. This is a quality product and I know they have had great success from all the Instagram exposure. But be careful what you wish for. With the hype and success, the company had better be prepared for the volume of orders and the procedures to ensure accurate shipping of those orders.
faceoff_negative.headline: Poor Fulfillment
